{{ja-kanjitab|へい|ぼん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=へいぼん}} compound {{m|zh|平凡|tr=bjæng bjom|lit=even, flat + in every case}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''pêng-hôan''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|へいぼん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|へいぼん}}

# {{l|en|mediocre}}, {{l|en|ordinary}}
#: {{ja-usex|'''平凡'''な政治家、'''平凡'''な才能|'''へいぼん''' な せいじか、 '''へいぼん''' な さいのう|a '''mediocre''' politician, an '''ordinary''' talent}}
